name: MMA Pankration
description:
MMA Pankration

Step into the octagon and stand against the champions of MMA Pankration! Feel the same thrill and will to win – be part of spectacular and realistic bouts and fight your way to the top. Are YOU ready to battle?

PICK YOUR FIGHTER
Yevgeniy Erokhin, Aleksey Gladiator Polpudnikov, Yevgeniy Bad Boy Ryazanov, Rustam Bogatirev, Elnur Agaev, Geronimo Dos Santos – the fighters of the Far Eastern Federation of Modern Pankration are always ready to fight.

TRAIN YOUR FIGHTER
Perform all kinds of punches and kicks and create your own fighting style. Each fighter has his ultimate ability – level up your fighter’s characteristics to show the best result.

FIGHT TO WIN
Push your way to glory winning one fight after another. Face the most dangerous and unpredictable fighters. Be the winner in every proposed battle to take the highest title!

MMA Pankration – start your fight today.

This application was created with support from the Far Eastern Federation of Modern Pankration.
